text: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ
translation: except what Allah wills[1], for indeed He knows what is manifest and what is hidden.
footnotes: [1] i.e., except what Allah wills to make you forget for wisdom such as abrogating or replacing a ruling by another.
